title: Tunis cake
description: A moist, lemony sponge topped with chocolate ganache and marzipan decorations. It looks wonderfully festive and is a great alternative to traditional Christmas cake. Equipment and preparation: you will need a 20cm/8in deep cake tin.
ingredients: 1 large lemon, finely grated zest only
400g/14oz plain chocolate, broken into small pieces
gel food colouring, in red and green
